top_banner.title: FESTIVAL PASSES 2024
top_banner.description: Passes are exclusively sold online, no passes will be available for sale at the entrance.
top_banner.description1: Passes to Tanweer Festival can be purchased for 1 day or 3 days.
top_banner.description2: All passes include full day access to the entire festival including music performances, workshops and sessions, Marketplace, Food Court and Art Installations.
top_banner.description3: Add a camping experience to any pass to experience the nature of the beautiful Mleiha desert while staying close to all the festivities.

festival_passes.title: General Admission
festival_passes.caption: FESTIVAL PASS
festival_passes.description: Three-day access to all areas in the festival and to the General Admission area of the main stage.

festival_passes.title: VIP
festival_passes.caption: FESTIVAL PASS
festival_passes.description: Three-day access to all areas in the festival, in addition to access to the VIP Lounge, valet parking, and premium VIP seating at the main stage.

day_passes.title: General Admission
day_passes.caption: day PASS
day_passes.description: One-day access to all areas in the festival and to the General Admission area of the main stage.

day_passes.title: VIP
day_passes.caption: day PASS
day_passes.description: One-day access to all areas in the festival, in addition to access to the VIP Lounge, valet parking, and premium VIP seating at the main stage.

last_paragraph: Explore our Stay & Activities page to enrich your experience at Tanweer Festival, ensuring every moment is infused with meaning and inspiration.
